Your gift may be designated to any of the School of LSCL or College of Liberal Arts and Sciences (LAS) funds below. To provide general support to the School of LSCL and its students, please direct your gift to the UIC LAS Fund for the School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics .      Give to the School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics      UIC LAS Fund for the School of Literatures, Cultural Studies, and Linguistics   $     This is an unrestricted fund used to support the academic mission of the School of LCSL.      Language Learning Center Fund   $          UIC The Fund for LAS   $     This is an unrestricted fund providing support for the academic mission of the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences.      UIC Liberal Arts and Sciences Scholarships   $     This fund enables the College to fulfill its commitment to provide critical scholarship support to our students.
